description.value: Primary Energy: Negative 5 (projecting terror, mental effect) Supporting Energy: Space 4 (self + 30ft cone + 1 minute) Range: Self (30-foot cone) Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 9 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Negative Potential + Negative Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: All creatures in cone make Will saves. Compare your weaving successes to each target's save successes. Based on net successes: 1 = Frightened, 2 = Fleeing, 3+ = Cowering. Creatures can make saves at end of turn to downgrade/end (1 success downgrades or ends). Saving Throw: Will (to resist fear) Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = Frightened (1 round), 2 = Fleeing (1 minute), 3 = Cowering, 4 = Paralyzed with fear (10 minutes) Frightened/Fleeing/Cowering Conditions: See conditions document for full mechanics.
